rules_text:
Haste
{T}: Create a Glyph token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if you control nine or more artifacts, transform Tireless Runescribe.
rules_text2:
First strike, trample
{T}: Create a Glyph token.
Artifacts you control have “{T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”
